    • controllers.MyMusicsController

extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller
    Central view show up my musics.

      • refreshMenuPlaylist

        private void refreshMenuPlaylist(boolean removeOldMenu)
        Adds the "ajouter à la playlist..." menu to the context menu which pops up with a right click.
        Parameters:
        removeOldMenu - if true, removes the old playlist menu to replace it with a new one. false should be used for initialization only, or else the menu will be duplicated.
